name: Kirin Path
prerequisiteFormula: @int_score >= 13 AND @feat:kirin_strike AND @feat:kirin_style AND @feat:improved_unarmed_strike AND @skill:knowledge_arcana >= 12 AND (@skill:knowledge#dungeoneering >= 5 OR @skill:knowledge#local >= 5 OR @skill:knowledge#planes >= 5 OR @skill:knowledge#religion >= 5)
descriptionText: You turn knowledge of your enemy into a flawless defense.
benefitText: Whenever you make a Knowledge check to identify a creature, even when using Kirin Style, you can take 10 even if stress and distractions would normally prevent you from doing so. While using Kirin Style against a creature you have identified using that feat, if the creature ends its turn within your threatened area, you can spend a use of your attacks of opportunity that round to move up to 5 feet times your Intelligence modifier (minimum 1). You must end your move in a square threatened by the creature. This move does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
